name: Geography
descriptions: The Geography minor develops spatial thinking and analytical skills through courses in human geography, physical geography, GIS, and regional studies.
Students complete a foundation course and upper-division electives selected in consultation with a departmental advisor.

courses: One of: GEOG 10003 - World Regional Geography or GEOG 10023 - An Urban World - 3 hrs.

electiveCourses.description: 15 additional hours including 6 hours from upper-division courses. Courses pre-approved by departmental advisor.
